content.rendered:
Directed by Aruna Jayawardana

Written by Ritesh Rana

Star Dilhani Ekanayake. Isuru Lokuhettiarachchi. Tashiya Kalidasa. Yehani Hansika. Randika Gunathilaka. Sooryaloka Dayaruwan. Suranga Ranawaka. Prasanna Dakumpitiya

Language English. Sinhala. Telugu

Producers Chiranjeevi. Hemalatha Pedamallu

Production Stein Film
